ProjectTitle: Development of a CRISPR-based tool for localized random mutagenesis of biosynthetic pathways
InitialFeedbackHistory: 29/06/2023 [REDACTED] mention that you will closely monitor the MIBBI, these already have standards relevant for your datatypes, eg MINSEQE, MIxS, MIFlowCyt for more information see https://fairsharing.org/MIBBI.
